description:
This hip Crown Heights apartment is close to Berg'n Beer Hall (next door!), Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanical Garden, Brooklyn Museum, Gladys, Chavellas, Friends and Lovers, and all that Franklin Ave and Crown Heights has to offer. Its easy to take the train to Manhattan, so you are not bound to Brooklyn. You’ll love the apartment because of the location, the people, the outdoors space, the neighborhood - it is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Nestled in the heart of hip Crown Heights, our apartment is just steps away from Berg'n Beer Hall, public transportation, many restaurants, coffee shops, shopping, and the beautiful Prospect Park!

Feel free to roam the apartment and the backyard! The space is yours to utilize.

If you need anything while you stay at our apartment (whether it is about how to use the dishwasher, to a restaurant reccomendation), please do not hesitate to call/text/email us!

Crown Heights is a cozy but buzzing hotspot in Brooklyn. This hip neighborhood has everything Brooklyn and NYC has to offer. Between dozens and dozens of restaurants and bars, and activities like the Brooklyn Museum and the Brooklyn Botanical Garden, you could spend a whole trip just exploring Crown Heights!

Our apartment is steps away from public transportation including subway lines and bus stops. Ubers and taxis are always around as well!

A information sheet regarding the area, the apartment, and, yes, the wifi, will be awaiting your arrival!
name: Hip Crown Heights Apartment with Backyard
review: Benjamin was a great host and his apartment was fantastic!  He communicated well and was very helpful in answering questions.  His place was also very comfortable and convenient for my stay.
